goal: EUVEPRO is the European Vegetable Protein Association, representing the interests of manufacturers, distributors and users of vegetable proteins for human consumption (food).  EUVEPRO was founded in 1977. It is a non-profit trade association representing the vegetable protein and associated products industry in Europe. EUVEPRO monitors EU and international legislative issues of relevance to its members, participates in public consultations, identifies potential conflicts and delivers common positions to international bodies and the European Institutions, and especially when addressing issues of scientific or technical nature. EUVEPRO promotes the recognition in European, national and international legislation, of vegetable protein products as foodstuffs and ingredients in their own right forming part of the normal diet of EU consumers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Trade
